Symbol.Script_1D:
gs_door_transom = 0 gs_sidelight_right = 0 gs_sidelight_left = 0 bArchedTop = 0 bEnableLeafUnderCut = 1 iOpeningMethod = 1 ! OPENMETHOD_OPEN_SIMP bAsymmetricLeafs = 0 bMetalDoor = 1 bEnableLeafRebateDepth3D = 1
if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 7 & GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 8 then
call "gs_general_lt_door_macro" parameters all A=A, gs_door_transom = gs_door_transom, gs_sidelight_right = gs_sidelight_right, gs_sidelight_left = gs_sidelight_left, bArchedTop = bArchedTop, bEnableLeafUnderCut = bEnableLeafUnderCut, iOpeningMethod = iOpeningMethod, bAsymmetricLeafs = bAsymmetricLeafs, bMetalDoor = bMetalDoor, bEnableLeafRebateDepth3D = bEnableLeafRebateDepth3D
endif

Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "54F05677-2318-4DCB-9579-45B48AF74B8B" _startID = "E11D500B-9380-473C-A193-94EFE5A0CE63" _endID = "7B20BAAF-E09F-4EF7-B10C-576B1687177D" gosub "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_FWM"
_startID = "7B20BAAF-E09F-4EF7-B10C-576B1687177D" _endID = "5A9826ED-CF64-4E86-92A9-66CF212E9CF3" gosub "NewSillTypes_FWM"
_startID = "5A9826ED-CF64-4E86-92A9-66CF212E9CF3" _endID = "B80369EE-D03A-4D63-A42A-B1BAEA84A537" gosub "NewDemolitionSymbol_FWM"
_startID = "B80369EE-D03A-4D63-A42A-B1BAEA84A537" _endID = "7A6723EF-CE98-4F66-850C-52CA0D1F8745" gosub "deleteUnusedListParams_FWM"
_startID = "7A6723EF-CE98-4F66-850C-52CA0D1F8745" _endID = "6600D266-CF9D-41BA-AB45-2FF4DED7D752" gosub "DoorPanelType_FWM"
_startID = "6600D266-CF9D-41BA-AB45-2FF4DED7D752" _endID = "35B402AC-9347-4063-8384-6906A343C4BD" gosub "RenameMinSpaceParams_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! B406_NewFuctionsCommon ! ============================================================================== "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID | actualGuid = _autoID then bMigrationSuccess = 1 call "Migration_DoorWindow" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, bMigrateDoorLeaf = 0, bMigrateDoorHandle = 0, bMigrateKickBoard = 1, bMigrateKickBoard2 = 0, bMigrateCasingType = 1, bMigrateBottomCasing = 0, bMigrateCasingCover = 1, returned_parameters bMigrationSuccess
if bMigrationSuccess then actualGUID = _endID else actualGuid = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewSillTypes ! ============================================================================== "NewSillTypes_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID then actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewDemolitionSymbol ! ============================================================================== "NewDemolitionSymbol_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID then actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! deleteUnusedListParams ! ============================================================================== "deleteUnusedListParams_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then _customList1 = "" _customList2 = "" _customList3 = "" _customList4 = "" _customList5 = ""
bDeleted = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom1", _customList1) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom2", _customList2) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom3", _customList3) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom4", _customList4) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom5", _customList5)
if _customList1 <> "" | \ _customList2 <> "" | \ _customList3 <> "" | \ _customList4 <> "" | \ _customList5 <> "" then
actualGUID = "" else actualGUID = _endID endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! DoorPanelType ! ============================================================================== "DoorPanelType_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then _gs_door_typ_m = 0 ! Empty bHas = DELETED_PAR_VALUE("gs_door_typ_m", _gs_door_typ_m)
iDoorPanelType = _gs_door_typ_m parameters iDoorPanelType = iDoorPanelType
actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! RenameMinSpaceParams ! ============================================================================== "RenameMinSpaceParams_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then bHas = DELETED_PAR_VALUE("ms_openingSWidth1", _ms_openingSWidth1) &\ DELETED_PAR_VALUE("ms_openingSWidth2", _ms_openingSWidth2) &\ DELETED_PAR_VALUE("ms_oppositeSWidth1", _ms_oppositeSWidth1) &\ DELETED_PAR_VALUE("ms_oppositeSWidth2", _ms_oppositeSWidth2)
if bHas then msOpeningSideWidth2 = _ms_openingSWidth1 msOpeningSideWidth1 = _ms_openingSWidth2 msOppositeSideWidth2 = _ms_oppositeSWidth1 msOppositeSideWidth1 = _ms_oppositeSWidth2
parameters msOpeningSideWidth2 = msOpeningSideWidth2, msOpeningSideWidth1 = msOpeningSideWidth1, msOppositeSideWidth2 = msOppositeSideWidth2, msOppositeSideWidth1 = msOppositeSideWidth1 endif
actualGUID = _endID endif return
Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "RenameMinSpaceParams_BWM"
gosub "DoorPanelType_BWM"
gosub "deleteUnusedListParams_BWM"
gosub "NewDemolitionSymbol_BWM"
gosub "NewSillTypes_BWM"
gosub "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_BWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGuid
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! RenameMinSpaceParams ! ============================================================================== "RenameMinSpaceParams_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "ms_openingSWidth1", "Length" newparameter "ms_openingSWidth2", "Length" newparameter "ms_oppositeSWidth1", "Length" newparameter "ms_oppositeSWidth2", "Length"
ms_openingSWidth1 = msOpeningSideWidth2 ms_openingSWidth2 = msOpeningSideWidth1 ms_oppositeSWidth1 = msOppositeSideWidth2 ms_oppositeSWidth2 = msOppositeSideWidth1
parameters ms_openingSWidth1 = ms_openingSWidth1, ms_openingSWidth2 = ms_openingSWidth2, ms_oppositeSWidth1 = ms_oppositeSWidth1, ms_oppositeSWidth2 = ms_oppositeSWidth2 endif return
! ============================================================================== ! DoorPanelType ! ============================================================================== "DoorPanelType_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "gs_door_typ_m", "Integer"
gs_door_typ_m = iDoorPanelType parameters gs_door_typ_m = gs_door_typ_m endif return
! ============================================================================== ! deleteUnusedListParams ! ============================================================================== "deleteUnusedListParams_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then ! Empty Step migrate backward every case endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewDemolitionSymbol ! ============================================================================== "NewDemolitionSymbol_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then if (iTypeDemolitionFill = 4) then ! RENOVATION_FILL_NEW_FULL targetGUID = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewSillTypes ! ============================================================================== "NewSillTypes_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then if gs_sill_outside & (iSillType = 1 |\ ! SILL_TIMBER iSillType = 4 |\ ! SILL_CERAMIC iSillType = 5 |\ ! SILL_ETHERNIT iSillType = 6 |\ ! SILL_CONCRETE_TUB iSillType = 7 |\ ! SILL_ALUMINIUM iSillType = 10 |\ ! SILL_SOLID_22 iSillType = 11 ) then ! SILL_METAL_1 targetGUID = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! B406_NewFuctionsCommon ! ============================================================================== "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then bMigrationSuccess = 1 call "Migration_DoorWindow" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, bMigrateDoorLeaf = 0, bMigrateDoorHandle = 0, bMigrateKickBoard = 1, bMigrateKickBoard2 = 0, bMigrateCasingType = 1, bMigrateBottomCasing = 0, bMigrateCasingCover = 1, returned_parameters bMigrationSuccess
if not(bMigrationSuccess) then targetGUID = "" endif endif return
Symbol.Comment: Навесная, открывающаяся в обе стороны дверь.
Symbol.Keywords: Номинальные размеры, типы коробок, типы полотен, типы ручек, открывание и знаки открывания в 2D/3D, порог, обшивка, подкладка, навес, четверть, каменная арка, замыкание стены, минимальное пространство, распашная дверь
